sentences.korean: 모든 반항 행위는 이질적인 집단들을 함께 <word id='_glue' class='word-target-kr'>접착시키는</word> 것처럼 보였다.

sentences.english: It was a <word id='_prudent' class='word-eng-link'>prudent</word> strategy to stay hidden, but the <word id='_desire' class='word-eng-link'>desire</word> for freedom was an <word id='_irresistible' class='word-eng-link'>irresistible</word> force.
sentences.korean: 숨어 지내는 것은 <word id='_prudent' class='word-target-kr'>신중한</word> 전략이었지만, 자유를 향한 <word id='_desire' class='word-target-kr'>열망은</word> <word id='_irresistible' class='word-target-kr'>저항할 수 없는</word> 힘이었다.

sentences.english: Kaelen, now a fugitive, had to <word id='_traverse' class='word-eng-link'>traverse</word> the city's underbelly, a place that was <word id='_unbearably' class='word-eng-link'>unbearably</word> <word id='_joyless' class='word-eng-link'>joyless</word>.
sentences.korean: 이제 도망자가 된 카엘렌은 <word id='_unbearably' class='word-target-kr'>극도로</word> <word id='_joyless' class='word-target-kr'>쓸쓸한</word> 도시의 밑바닥을 <word id='_traverse' class='word-target-kr'>가로질러야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: He had to <word id='_calculate' class='word-eng-link'>calculate</word> every risk, every move.
sentences.korean: 그는 모든 위험과 모든 움직임을 <word id='_calculate' class='word-target-kr'>추정해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: The rebels began to <word id='_claim' class='word-eng-link'>claim</word> small victories, disrupting the flow of <word id='_freight' class='word-eng-link'>freight</word> to the elite sectors.
sentences.korean: 반란군은 엘리트 구역으로 가는 <word id='_freight' class='word-target-kr'>화물</word>의 흐름을 방해하며 작은 승리를 <word id='_claim' class='word-target-kr'>요구하기</word> 시작했다.

sentences.english: They would <word id='_commemorate' class='word-eng-link'>commemorate</word> each success with a silent, determined nod, a promise of the larger <word id='_feast' class='word-eng-link'>feast</word> to come.
sentences.korean: 그들은 다가올 더 큰 <word id='_feast' class='word-target-kr'>축제</word>를 약속하며, 조용하고 단호한 끄덕임으로 각각의 성공을 <word id='_commemorate' class='word-target-kr'>기념하곤</word> 했다.

sentences.english: This growing resistance was a direct challenge; the rebels would <word id='_defy' class='word-eng-link'>defy</word> the Alphas at every opportunity.
sentences.korean: 이러한 저항의 확산은 직접적인 도전이었다. 반란군은 모든 기회에 알파들에게 <word id='_defy' class='word-target-kr'>도전할</word> 것이었다.

sentences.english: The <word id='_main' class='word-eng-link'>main</word> <word id='_hub' class='word-eng-link'>hub</word> of their operation was an abandoned subway station.
sentences.korean: 그들의 작전의 <word id='_main' class='word-target-kr'>주요</word> <word id='_hub' class='word-target-kr'>중심</word>은 버려진 지하철역이었다.

sentences.english: They worked <word id='_diligently' class='word-eng-link'>diligently</word>, their actions a stark contrast to the <word id='_negligence' class='word-eng-link'>negligence</word> of the ruling class towards the Naturals.
sentences.korean: 그들은 <word id='_diligently' class='word-target-kr'>열심히</word> 일했으며, 그들의 행동은 내추럴에 대한 지배 계급의 <word id='_negligence' class='word-target-kr'>태만</word>과는 극명한 대조를 이루었다.

sentences.english: The beauty that used to <word id='_adorn' class='word-eng-link'>adorn</word> the city now felt like a lie.
sentences.korean: 예전에 도시를 <word id='_adorn' class='word-target-kr'>장식했던</word> 아름다움은 이제 거짓말처럼 느껴졌다.

sentences.english: The rebellion's success would <word id='_outweigh' class='word-eng-link'>outweigh</word> the personal risks involved.
sentences.korean: 반란의 성공은 관련된 개인적인 위험보다 <word id='_outweigh' class='word-target-kr'>더 뛰어날</word> 것이었다.

sentences.english: They had to <word id='_overtake' class='word-eng-link'>overtake</word> the regime's propaganda machine.
sentences.korean: 그들은 정권의 선전 기계를 <word id='_overtake' class='word-target-kr'>따라잡아야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: Kaelen had to <word id='_revise' class='word-eng-link'>revise</word> his plans constantly as the situation was always <word id='_variable' class='word-eng-link'>variable</word>.
sentences.korean: 상황이 항상 <word id='_variable' class='word-target-kr'>변화하기</word> 때문에 카엘렌은 끊임없이 계획을 <word id='_revise' class='word-target-kr'>수정해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: He believed that a society should be <word id='_sociable' class='word-eng-link'>sociable</word> and just, not a place of fear.
sentences.korean: 그는 사회가 두려움의 장소가 아니라 <word id='_sociable' class='word-target-kr'>사교적이고</word> 정의로운 곳이어야 한다고 믿었다.

sentences.english: The rebels' <word id='_spirit' class='word-eng-link'>spirit</word> was strong, a collective will for a better future.
sentences.korean: 반란군의 <word id='_spirit' class='word-target-kr'>성향은</word> 더 나은 미래를 위한 집단적 의지로 강했다.

sentences.english: A <word id='_skillful' class='word-eng-link'>skillful</word> hacker joined their ranks, giving them a much-needed edge.
sentences.korean: 한 <word id='_skillful' class='word-target-kr'>숙련된</word> 해커가 그들의 대열에 합류하여 절실히 필요했던 우위를 제공했다.

sentences.english: The fight for a <word id='_wholesome' class='word-eng-link'>wholesome</word> future had <word id='_actually' class='word-eng-link'>actually</word> begun.
sentences.korean: <word id='_wholesome' class='word-target-kr'>건강에 좋은</word> 미래를 위한 싸움이 <word id='_actually' class='word-target-kr'>실제로</word> 시작되었다.

sentences.english: The <word id='_delicacy' class='word-eng-link'>delicacy</word> of their network was its greatest vulnerability.
sentences.korean: 그들 네트워크의 <word id='_delicacy' class='word-target-kr'>섬세함은</word> 가장 큰 취약점이었다.

sentences.english: There was a strange <word id='_conformity' class='word-eng-link'>conformity</word> in the Alphas' cruelty.
sentences.korean: 알파들의 잔인함에는 이상한 <word id='_conformity' class='word-target-kr'>일치</word>가 있었다.

sentences.english: The rebels' actions might <word id='_incommode' class='word-eng-link'>incommode</word> the powerful, but it was a necessary disruption.
sentences.korean: 반란군의 행동이 권력자들을 <word id='_incommode' class='word-target-kr'>괴롭힐</word> 수도 있었지만, 그것은 필요한 방해였다.

sentences.english: This wasn't a fight for <word id='_juvenile' class='word-eng-link'>juvenile</word> ideals, but for their very survival.
sentences.korean: 이것은 <word id='_juvenile' class='word-target-kr'>어린</word> 이상을 위한 싸움이 아니라, 바로 그들의 생존을 위한 싸움이었다.

sentences.english: The propaganda of the <word id='_affluent' class='word-eng-link'>affluent</word> Alphas sought to paint the rebellion as a <word id='_ludicrous' class='word-eng-link'>ludicrous' action by the desperate.
sentences.korean: <word id='_affluent' class='word-target-kr'>부유한</word> 알파들의 선전은 반란을 절박한 자들의 <word id='_ludicrous' class='word-target-kr'>우스꽝스러운</word> 행동으로 묘사하려 했다.

sentences.english: The state-controlled media would <word id='_mock' class='word-eng-link'>mock</word> their efforts daily.
sentences.korean: 국영 언론은 매일 그들의 노력을 <word id='_mock' class='word-target-kr'>조롱하곤</word> 했다.

sentences.english: These actions would only <word id='_aggravate' class='word-eng-link'>aggravate</word> the underlying tensions within the city.
sentences.korean: 이러한 행동들은 도시 내의 근본적인 긴장을 <word id='_aggravate' class='word-target-kr'>악화시킬</word> 뿐이었다.

sentences.english: Kaelen knew he had to <word id='_manipulate' class='word-eng-link'>manipulate</word> the flow of information to counter their narrative.
sentences.korean: 카엘렌은 그들의 이야기에 맞서기 위해 정보의 흐름을 <word id='_manipulate' class='word-target-kr'>조종해야</word> 한다는 것을 알았다.

sentences.english: He had to <word id='_disclose' class='word-eng-link'>disclose</word> the full truth of the Alphas' plans.
sentences.korean: 그는 알파들의 계획의 모든 진실을 <word id='_disclose' class='word-target-kr'>밝혀야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: The Alphas' <word id='_dominant' class='word-eng-link'>dominant</word> position was built on a <word id='_corrupt' class='word-eng-link'>corrupt</word> foundation.
sentences.korean: 알파들의 <word id='_dominant' class='word-target-kr'>지배적인</word> 지위는 <word id='_corrupt' class='word-target-kr'>부패한</word> 기반 위에 세워졌다.

sentences.english: The long-term <word id='_effect' class='word-eng-link'>effect</word> of their genetic tampering was unknown.
sentences.korean: 그들의 유전자 조작의 장기적인 <word id='_effect' class='word-target-kr'>결과는</word> 알려지지 않았다.

sentences.english: Their goal was to <word id='_eradicate' class='word-eng-link'>eradicate</word> what they saw as imperfections in the human <word id='_heritage' class='word-eng-link'>heritage</word>.
sentences.korean: 그들의 목표는 인간 <word id='_heritage' class='word-target-kr'>유산</word>의 불완전함이라고 여기는 것을 <word id='_eradicate' class='word-target-kr'>근절하는</word> 것이었다.

sentences.english: Their methods were <word id='_harsh' class='word-eng-link'>harsh</word> and without mercy.
sentences.korean: 그들의 방법은 <word id='_harsh' class='word-target-kr'>가혹하고</word> 무자비했다.

sentences.english: A captured rebel, a mere boy, was made an example of, his defiance labeled as <word id='_insolent' class='word-eng-link'>insolent' behavior.
sentences.korean: 포로로 잡힌 한 반란군 소년은 본보기가 되었고, 그의 반항은 <word id='_insolent' class='word-target-kr'>거만한</word> 행동으로 낙인찍혔다.

sentences.english: This act put the entire rebellion in <word id='_jeopardy' class='word-eng-link'>jeopardy</word>.
sentences.korean: 이 행동은 전체 반란을 <word id='_jeopardy' class='word-target-kr'>위험에</word> 빠뜨렸다.

sentences.english: The Naturals' <word id='_isolation' class='word-eng-link'>isolation</word> in the outer sectors was a key part of the Alphas' control.
sentences.korean: 외부 구역에서 내추럴들의 <word id='_isolation' class='word-target-kr'>분리는</word> 알파들 통제의 핵심 부분이었다.

sentences.english: There was a growing <word id='_mutiny' class='word-eng-link'>mutiny</word> brewing even among the lower-ranking Alpha patrols.
sentences.korean: 하급 알파 순찰대 사이에서도 <word id='_mutiny' class='word-target-kr'>반란이</word> 커지고 있었다.

sentences.english: Every piece of data Kaelen held was <word id='_precious' class='word-eng-link'>precious</word>.
sentences.korean: 카엘렌이 가진 모든 데이터 조각은 <word id='_precious' class='word-target-kr'>귀중했다</word>.

sentences.english: He had little <word id='_regard' class='word-eng-link'>regard</word> for his own safety.
sentences.korean: 그는 자신의 안전에 거의 <word id='_regard' class='word-target-kr'>존경을</word> 표하지 않았다.

sentences.english: The Alphas would not <word id='_reign' class='word-eng-link'>reign</word> forever.
sentences.korean: 알파들은 영원히 <word id='_reign' class='word-target-kr'>지배하지</word> 못할 것이었다.

sentences.english: Kaelen had to <word id='_revive' class='word-eng-link'>revive</word> hope in those who had none left.
sentences.korean: 카엘렌은 희망이 없는 사람들에게 희망을 <word id='_revive' class='word-target-kr'>소생시켜야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: The rebellion had to be <word id='_swift' class='word-eng-link'>swift</word> and precise in its actions.
sentences.korean: 반란은 행동에 있어 <word id='_swift' class='word-target-kr'>빠르고</word> 정확해야 했다.

sentences.english: They had to <word id='_synchronize' class='word-eng-link'>synchronize</word> their attacks across the city.
sentences.korean: 그들은 도시 전역에서 공격을 <word id='_synchronize' class='word-target-kr'>동시에 일어나게</word> 해야 했다.

sentences.english: The news of the rebellion spread <word id='_throughout' class='word-eng-link'>throughout</word> the hidden networks of the Naturals.
sentences.korean: 반란 소식은 내추럴들의 숨겨진 네트워크 <word id='_throughout' class='word-target-kr'>도처에</word> 퍼졌다.

sentences.english: Any Alpha who helped them was considered a <word id='_traitor' class='word-eng-link'>traitor</word> by their own kind.
sentences.korean: 그들을 도운 알파는 누구든 동족에게 <word id='_traitor' class='word-target-kr'>반역자로</word> 여겨졌다.

sentences.english: The rebellion's primary goal was to <word id='_undermine' class='word-eng-link'>undermine</word> the AI that controlled the city's infrastructure.
sentences.korean: 반란의 주요 목표는 도시의 기반 시설을 통제하는 AI를 <word id='_undermine' class='word-target-kr'>약화시키는</word> 것이었다.

sentences.english: A single, well-placed attack could <word id='_upset' class='word-eng-link'>upset</word> the entire system.
sentences.korean: 한 번의 잘 계획된 공격으로 전체 시스템을 <word id='_upset' class='word-target-kr'>뒤엎을</word> 수 있었다.

sentences.english: This chaos would <word id='_upset' class='word-eng-link'>upset</word> the Alpha leadership more than any direct assault.
sentences.korean: 이 혼란은 어떤 직접적인 공격보다도 알파 지도부를 <word id='_upset' class='word-target-kr'>당황하게 할</word> 것이었다.

sentences.english: To the oppressed, Kaelen's actions seemed almost <word id='_virtuous' class='word-eng-link'>virtuous</word>.
sentences.korean: 억압받는 사람들에게 카엘렌의 행동은 거의 <word id='_virtuous' class='word-target-kr'>정숙해</word> 보였다.

sentences.english: The rebellion could not be based on a mere <word id='_whim' class='word-eng-link'>whim</word>, but on a solid plan.
sentences.korean: 반란은 단순한 <word id='_whim' class='word-target-kr'>변덕</word>이 아니라 확고한 계획에 기반해야 했다.

sentences.english: They would not <word id='_withdraw' class='word-eng-link'>withdraw</word> until their goals were met.
sentences.korean: 그들은 목표가 달성될 때까지 <word id='_withdraw' class='word-target-kr'>물러나지</word> 않을 것이었다.

sentences.english: Some Naturals almost seemed to <word id='_worship' class='word-eng-link'>worship</word> Kaelen as a savior.
sentences.korean: 일부 내추럴들은 카엘렌을 구세주처럼 거의 <word id='_worship' class='word-target-kr'>숭배하는</word> 것처럼 보였다.

sentences.english: He had to make a <word id='_decent' class='word-eng-link'>decent</word> choice for his people.
sentences.korean: 그는 자신의 민족을 위해 <word id='_decent' class='word-target-kr'>예의 바른</word> 선택을 해야 했다.

sentences.english: A <word id='_critic' class='word-eng-link'>critic</word> from within his own circle questioned his risky methods.
sentences.korean: 자신의 서클 내의 한 <word id='_critic' class='word-target-kr'>비평가가</word> 그의 위험한 방법에 의문을 제기했다.

sentences.english: He found a <word id='_disciple' class='word-eng-link'>disciple</word> in a young, eager rebel who would follow his every command.
sentences.korean: 그는 그의 모든 명령을 따를 젊고 열성적인 반란군에서 <word id='_disciple' class='word-target-kr'>제자를</word> 찾았다.

sentences.english: He had to <word id='_enunciate' class='word-eng-link'>enunciate</word> his orders with clarity and confidence.
sentences.korean: 그는 명확하고 자신감 있게 명령을 <word id='_enunciate' class='word-target-kr'>분명하게 발음해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: Any speech deemed <word id='_inappropriate' class='word-eng-link'>inappropriate</word> by the Alphas was grounds for arrest.
sentences.korean: 알파들에 의해 <word id='_inappropriate' class='word-target-kr'>부적당하다고</word> 여겨지는 어떤 연설도 체포 사유가 되었다.

sentences.english: The main rebel base was located in a <word id='_spacious' class='word-eng-link'>spacious</word> cavern deep underground.
sentences.korean: 주요 반란군 기지는 지하 깊은 곳의 <word id='_spacious' class='word-target-kr'>넓은</word> 동굴에 위치해 있었다.

sentences.english: Every <word id='_spectator' class='word-eng-link'>spectator</word> of the public punishments felt a mix of fear and anger.
sentences.korean: 공개 처벌의 모든 <word id='_spectator' class='word-target-kr'>구경꾼은</word> 두려움과 분노가 뒤섞인 감정을 느꼈다.

sentences.english: They had to <word id='_retreat' class='word-eng-link'>retreat</word> after every strike, vanishing into the city's forgotten corners.
sentences.korean: 그들은 매번의 공격 후에 도시의 잊혀진 구석으로 사라지며 <word id='_retreat' class='word-target-kr'>되돌아가야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: A secret meeting was to be <word id='_situate' class='word-eng-link'>situate</word>d in an old warehouse.
sentences.korean: 비밀 회의는 오래된 창고에 <word id='_situate' class='word-target-kr'>놓일</word> 예정이었다.

sentences.english: The city was a <word id='_picturesque' class='word-eng-link'>picturesque</word> prison, beautiful on the outside but rotting within.
sentences.korean: 그 도시는 겉보기에는 아름답지만 속은 썩어가는 <word id='_picturesque' class='word-target-kr'>그림같이 아름다운</word> 감옥이었다.

sentences.english: The rebellion was not just an act of defiance, but a necessary <word id='_mutiny' class='word-eng-link'>mutiny</word> against a tyrannical <word id='_master' class='word-eng-link'>master</word>.
sentences.korean: 반란은 단순한 반항 행위가 아니라, 폭군적인 <word id='_master' class='word-target-kr'>주인</word>에 대한 필연적인 <word id='_mutiny' class='word-target-kr'>반란</word>이었다.

sentences.english: They had no other <word id='_alternative' class='word-eng-link'>alternative</word> but to fight back.
sentences.korean: 그들에게는 맞서 싸우는 것 외에 다른 <word id='_alternative' class='word-target-kr'>대안</word>이 없었다.

sentences.english: The Alpha's rule was <word id='_strict' class='word-eng-link'>strict</word> and unforgiving.
sentences.korean: 알파의 통치는 <word id='_strict' class='word-target-kr'>엄격하고</word> 용서가 없었다.

sentences.english: The current situation was <word id='_analogous' class='word-eng-link'>analogous</word> to the darkest periods of human history.
sentences.korean: 현재 상황은 인류 역사상 가장 어두운 시기들과 <word id='_analogous' class='word-target-kr'>유사했다</word>.

sentences.english: Kaelen had to <word id='_sort' class='word-eng-link'>sort</word> through vast amounts of data to find a weakness in the AI's logic.
sentences.korean: 카엘렌은 AI 논리의 약점을 찾기 위해 방대한 양의 데이터를 <word id='_sort' class='word-target-kr'>분류해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: His every action had to be <word id='_skillful' class='word-eng-link'>skillful</word> to avoid capture.
sentences.korean: 그의 모든 행동은 포획을 피하기 위해 <word id='_skillful' class='word-target-kr'>숙련되어야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: His life of <word id='_isolation' class='word-eng-link'>isolation</word> as a fugitive was a constant strain.
sentences.korean: 도망자로서의 그의 <word id='_isolation' class='word-target-kr'>분리된</word> 삶은 끊임없는 긴장이었다.

sentences.english: The most important <word id='_feature' class='word-eng-link'>feature</word> of their plan was its secrecy.
sentences.korean: 그들 계획의 가장 중요한 <word id='_feature' class='word-target-kr'>특징은</word> 비밀 유지였다.

sentences.english: He decided to <word id='_disclose' class='word-eng-link'>disclose</word> his next move to only a few trusted allies.
sentences.korean: 그는 자신의 다음 수를 몇몇 신뢰하는 동맹에게만 <word id='_disclose' class='word-target-kr'>밝히기로</word> 결정했다.

sentences.english: He could not afford to be <word id='_unmindful' class='word-eng-link'>unmindful</word> of the dangers around him.
sentences.korean: 그는 주변의 위험에 대해 <word id='_unmindful' class='word-target-kr'>부주의할</word> 여유가 없었다.

sentences.english: The struggle was a truly <word id='_contemporary' class='word-eng-link'>contemporary</word> conflict, a war fought with data as much as with weapons.
sentences.korean: 그 투쟁은 무기만큼이나 데이터로 싸우는 진정한 <word id='_contemporary' class='word-target-kr'>동시대의</word> 갈등이었다.

sentences.english: A message <word id='_incised' class='word-eng-link'>incised</word> on a datachip was their only hope.
sentences.korean: 데이터칩에 <word id='_incised' class='word-target-kr'>새겨진</word> 메시지가 그들의 유일한 희망이었다.

sentences.english: It was <word id='_prudent' class='word-eng-link'>prudent</word> to assume that all their communications were monitored.
sentences.korean: 그들의 모든 통신이 감시되고 있다고 가정하는 것이 <word id='_prudent' class='word-target-kr'>신중했다</word>.

sentences.english: Two separate attacks had to <word id='_synchronize' class='word-eng-link'>synchronize</word> perfectly to succeed.
sentences.korean: 성공하기 위해서는 두 번의 별개의 공격이 완벽하게 <word id='_synchronize' class='word-target-kr'>동시에 일어나야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: There could be no <word id='_exception' class='word-eng-link'>exception</word> to their security protocols.
sentences.korean: 그들의 보안 프로토콜에는 <word id='_exception' class='word-target-kr'>예외가</word> 있을 수 없었다.

sentences.english: A new <word id='_lead' class='word-eng-link'>lead</word> pointed to a vulnerability in the city's power grid.
sentences.korean: 새로운 <word id='_lead' class='word-target-kr'>단서가</word> 도시의 전력망 취약점을 가리켰다.

sentences.english: They had only one <word id='_option' class='word-eng-link'>option</word>: a high-risk, high-reward attack.
sentences.korean: 그들에게는 고위험, 고수익의 공격이라는 단 하나의 <word id='_option' class='word-target-kr'>선택</word>만이 있었다.

sentences.english: The plan was met with some <word id='_fractious' class='word-eng-link'>fractious</word> debate among the rebel leaders.
sentences.korean: 그 계획은 반란군 지도자들 사이에서 약간의 <word id='_fractious' class='word-target-kr'>성미가 까다로운</word> 논쟁에 부딪혔다.

sentences.english: Kaelen's vision was a more <word id='_wholesome' class='word-eng-link'>wholesome</word> society for everyone, not just the elite.
sentences.korean: 카엘렌의 비전은 엘리트뿐만 아니라 모두를 위한 더 <word id='_wholesome' class='word-target-kr'>건강에 좋은</word> 사회였다.

sentences.english: He had to <word id='_undermine' class='word-eng-link'>undermine</word> the Alphas' authority without causing mass civilian casualties.
sentences.korean: 그는 대규모 민간인 사상자를 내지 않으면서 알파들의 권위를 <word id='_undermine' class='word-target-kr'>약화시켜야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: The mood in the hidden camps was often <word id='_joyless' class='word-eng-link'>joyless</word>, filled with the tension of their struggle.
sentences.korean: 숨겨진 캠프의 분위기는 종종 <word id='_joyless' class='word-target-kr'>쓸쓸했으며</word>, 그들의 투쟁의 긴장감으로 가득 차 있었다.

sentences.english: To plant the virus, a small team would have to <word id='_traverse' class='word-eng-link'>traverse</word> the most heavily guarded sector of the city.
sentences.korean: 바이러스를 심기 위해, 작은 팀이 도시의 가장 삼엄하게 경비되는 구역을 <word id='_traverse' class='word-target-kr'>가로질러야</word> 할 것이었다.

sentences.english: The hacker had to <word id='_improvise' class='word-eng-link'>improvise</word> a solution when a firewall unexpectedly updated.
sentences.korean: 방화벽이 예기치 않게 업데이트되었을 때 해커는 해결책을 <word id='_improvise' class='word-target-kr'>즉흥적으로 만들어야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: The effects of their actions were felt <word id='_throughout' class='word-eng-link'>throughout</word> the entire metropolis.
sentences.korean: 그들의 행동의 효과는 대도시 <word id='_throughout' class='word-target-kr'>도처에서</word> 느껴졌다.

sentences.english: He had to <word id='_scale' class='word-eng-link'>scale</word> the wall of a skyscraper to access a critical network node.
sentences.korean: 그는 중요한 네트워크 노드에 접근하기 위해 고층 빌딩의 벽을 <word id='_scale' class='word-target-kr'>기어올라야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: The rebels would <word id='_gather' class='word-eng-link'>gather</word> again after the mission to assess the results.
sentences.korean: 반란군은 임무 후에 다시 <word id='_gather' class='word-target-kr'>모여</word> 결과를 평가할 것이었다.

sentences.english: The abandoned factory they used as a temporary base was surprisingly <word id='_spacious' class='word-eng-link'>spacious</word>.
sentences.korean: 그들이 임시 기지로 사용했던 버려진 공장은 놀랍게도 <word id='_spacious' class='word-target-kr'>넓었다</word>.

sentences.english: The rebellion was an attempt to <word id='_upset' class='word-eng-link'>upset</word> the oppressive order.
sentences.korean: 반란은 억압적인 질서를 <word id='_upset' class='word-target-kr'>뒤엎으려는</word> 시도였다.

sentences.english: Kaelen did not want his followers to <word id='_withdraw' class='word-eng-link'>withdraw</word> into fear.
sentences.korean: 카엘렌은 그의 추종자들이 두려움 속으로 <word id='_withdraw' class='word-target-kr'>물러나기를</word> 원하지 않았다.

sentences.english: If they were to <word id='_return' class='word-eng-link'>return</word> to a life of servitude, their struggle would be for nothing.
sentences.korean: 만약 그들이 노예 생활로 <word id='_return' class='word-target-kr'>되돌아간다면</word>, 그들의 투쟁은 아무것도 아닌 것이 될 것이었다.

sentences.english: Two patrol drones were about to <word id='_collide' class='word-eng-link'>collide</word> due to the network disruption.
sentences.korean: 두 순찰 드론이 네트워크 중단으로 인해 거의 <word id='_collide' class='word-target-kr'>충돌할</word> 뻔했다.

sentences.english: He had to <word id='_revise' class='word-eng-link'>revise</word> the escape route on the fly.
sentences.korean: 그는 즉석에서 탈출 경로를 <word id='_revise' class='word-target-kr'>수정해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: The escape route would <word id='_loop' class='word-eng-link'>loop</word> back through the old sewer system.
sentences.korean: 탈출 경로는 오래된 하수도 시스템을 통해 다시 <word id='_loop' class='word-target-kr'>되돌아갈</word> 것이었다.

sentences.english: Kaelen's actions, while destructive, were seen as <word id='_virtuous' class='word-eng-link'>virtuous</word> by many.
sentences.korean: 파괴적이긴 했지만 카엘렌의 행동은 많은 사람들에게 <word id='_virtuous' class='word-target-kr'>덕 있는</word> 것으로 여겨졌다.

sentences.english: He was the <word id='_hub' class='word-eng-link'>hub</word> of the entire resistance.
sentences.korean: 그는 전체 저항의 <word id='_hub' class='word-target-kr'>중심</word>이었다.

sentences.english: The city, once a symbol of progress, now seemed to <word id='_upset' class='word-eng-link'>upset</word> the natural order.
sentences.korean: 한때 진보의 상징이었던 그 도시는 이제 자연 질서를 <word id='_upset' class='word-target-kr'>당황하게 하는</word> 것처럼 보였다.

sentences.english: They would not <word id='_defy' class='word-eng-link'>defy</word> their own principles in the fight for freedom.
sentences.korean: 그들은 자유를 위한 투쟁에서 자신들의 원칙을 <word id='_defy' class='word-target-kr'>도전하지</word> 않을 것이었다.

sentences.english: The coming days would be a <word id='_feast' class='word-eng-link'>feast</word> for the vultures, a time of great conflict.
sentences.korean: 다가오는 날들은 독수리들을 위한 <word id='_feast' class='word-target-kr'>축제</word>, 즉 큰 갈등의 시간이 될 것이었다.

sentences.english: The colorful <word id='_plumage' class='word-eng-link'>plumage</word> of the genetically engineered birds in the elite sectors was a stark contrast to the grayness of the Natural sectors.
sentences.korean: 엘리트 구역에 있는 유전적으로 조작된 새들의 화려한 <word id='_plumage' class='word-target-kr'>깃털은</word> 내추럴 구역의 회색빛과 극명한 대조를 이루었다.

sentences.english: The rebellion needed <word id='_absolute' class='word-eng-link'>absolute</word> secrecy to succeed.
sentences.korean: 반란이 성공하기 위해서는 <word id='_absolute' class='word-target-kr'>절대적인</word> 비밀 유지가 필요했다.

sentences.english: Their tactics were <word id='_adapted' class='word-eng-link'>adapted</word> from old military manuals.
sentences.korean: 그들의 전술은 오래된 군사 교범에서 <word id='_adapted' class='word-target-kr'>개조되었다</word>.

sentences.english: They met in a small, hidden <word id='_chamber' class='word-eng-link'>chamber</word> beneath the city.
sentences.korean: 그들은 도시 아래의 작고 숨겨진 <word id='_chamber' class='word-target-kr'>방에서</word> 만났다.

sentences.english: They had to <word id='_compact' class='word-eng-link'>compact</word> their supplies into small, easily transportable containers.
sentences.korean: 그들은 보급품을 작고 운반하기 쉬운 용기에 <word id='_compact' class='word-target-kr'>압축해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: There was no room for <word id='_complacency' class='word-eng-link'>complacency</word> in their ranks.
sentences.korean: 그들의 대열에는 <word id='_complacency' class='word-target-kr'>만족할</word> 여지가 없었다.

sentences.english: It was a <word id='_compulsory' class='word-eng-link'>compulsory</word> rule that no one ever operated alone.
sentences.korean: 아무도 혼자 작전하지 않는다는 것은 <word id='_compulsory' class='word-target-kr'>강제적인</word> 규칙이었다.

sentences.english: With their victories came a <word id='_concomitant' class='word-eng-link'>concomitant</word> increase in risk.
sentences.korean: 그들의 승리와 함께 위험도 <word id='_concomitant' class='word-target-kr'>동시에 일어나는</word> 증가가 있었다.

sentences.english: They had to <word id='_condense' class='word-eng-link'>condense</word> the complex data into a simple message that everyone could understand.
sentences.korean: 그들은 복잡한 데이터를 모든 사람이 이해할 수 있는 간단한 메시지로 <word id='_condense' class='word-target-kr'>압축해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: While some wanted to <word id='_conform' class='word-eng-link'>conform</word> to the Alphas' rule for an easier life, many more chose to fight.
sentences.korean: 어떤 사람들은 더 쉬운 삶을 위해 알파들의 규칙에 <word id='_conform' class='word-target-kr'>순응하기를</word> 원했지만, 더 많은 사람들이 싸우기를 선택했다.

sentences.english: Their message had to be <word id='_consistent' class='word-eng-link'>consistent</word> to win the hearts of the people.
sentences.korean: 사람들의 마음을 얻기 위해서는 그들의 메시지가 <word id='_consistent' class='word-target-kr'>일관되어야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: The regime tried to <word id='_constrain' class='word-eng-link'>constrain</word> the flow of information.
sentences.korean: 정권은 정보의 흐름을 <word id='_constrain' class='word-target-kr'>제한하려고</word> 했다.

sentences.english: The hope for freedom was <word id='_contagious' class='word-eng-link'>contagious</word>.
sentences.korean: 자유에 대한 희망은 <word id='_contagious' class='word-target-kr'>전염성이 있었다</word>.

sentences.english: Kaelen's <word id='_counterpart' class='word-eng-link'>counterpart</word> in the Alpha security force was a cold and calculating woman named Lyra.
sentences.korean: 알파 보안군의 카엘렌의 <word id='_counterpart' class='word-target-kr'>대응물은</word> 라이라라는 이름의 냉정하고 계산적인 여성이었다.

sentences.english: The aftermath of their sabotage left <word id='_debris' class='word-eng-link'>debris</word> across the plaza.
sentences.korean: 그들의 사보타주 여파로 광장 곳곳에 <word id='_debris' class='word-target-kr'>잔해</word>가 남았다.

sentences.english: Their next move had to be <word id='_decisive' class='word-eng-link'>decisive</word>.
sentences.korean: 그들의 다음 수는 <word id='_decisive' class='word-target-kr'>결정적이어야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: The Alphas would <word id='_disdain' class='word-eng-link'>disdain</word> any attempt at negotiation.
sentences.korean: 알파들은 어떤 협상 시도도 <word id='_disdain' class='word-target-kr'>경멸할</word> 것이었다.

sentences.english: Every <word id='_element' class='word-eng-link'>element</word> of their plan had to be perfect.
sentences.korean: 그들 계획의 모든 <word id='_element' class='word-target-kr'>구성요소는</word> 완벽해야 했다.

sentences.english: Kaelen hoped to <word id='_enlighten' class='word-eng-link'>enlighten</word> not just the Naturals, but some of the Alphas as well.
sentences.korean: 카엘렌은 내추럴뿐만 아니라 일부 알파들도 <word id='_enlighten' class='word-target-kr'>계몽하기를</word> 희망했다.

sentences.english: The AI's behavior became <word id='_erratic' class='word-eng-link'>erratic</word> after the virus attack.
sentences.korean: 바이러스 공격 이후 AI의 행동은 <word id='_erratic' class='word-target-kr'>변덕스러워졌다</word>.

sentences.english: They had to <word id='_exhaust' class='word-eng-link'>exhaust</word> every possible option before making their final move.
sentences.korean: 그들은 마지막 수를 두기 전에 가능한 모든 선택지를 <word id='_exhaust' class='word-target-kr'>소모해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: They needed to <word id='_expand' class='word-eng-link'>expand</word> their network of spies.
sentences.korean: 그들은 스파이 네트워크를 <word id='_expand' class='word-target-kr'>확장해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: Lyra's public statements were <word id='_flattering' class='word-eng-link'>flattering</word> to the AI, but her private communications revealed her doubts.
sentences.korean: 라이라의 공개적인 발언은 AI에게 <word id='_flattering' class='word-target-kr'>아부하는</word> 것이었지만, 그녀의 사적인 통신은 그녀의 의심을 드러냈다.

sentences.english: The rebellion had grown into a <word id='_full-blown' class='word-eng-link'>full-blown</word> movement.
sentences.korean: 반란은 <word id='_full-blown' class='word-target-kr'>성숙한</word> 운동으로 성장했다.

sentences.english: <word id='_henceforth' class='word-eng-link'>henceforth</word>, they would be known not as rebels, but as revolutionaries.
sentences.korean: <word id='_henceforth' class='word-target-kr'>앞으로</word>, 그들은 반란군이 아니라 혁명가로 알려질 것이었다.

sentences.english: The AI's defense system was an <word id='_intricate' class='word-eng-link'>intricate</word> web of firewalls and countermeasures.
sentences.korean: AI의 방어 시스템은 방화벽과 대응책의 <word id='_intricate' class='word-target-kr'>복잡한</word> 거미줄이었다.

sentences.english: They faced a <word id='_mammoth' class='word-eng-link'>mammoth</word> task.
sentences.korean: 그들은 <word id='_mammoth' class='word-target-kr'>거대한</word> 과제에 직면했다.

sentences.english: This was not <word id='_merely' class='word-eng-link'>merely</word> a fight for survival, but for the soul of humanity.
sentences.korean: 이것은 <word id='_merely' class='word-target-kr'>단지</word> 생존을 위한 싸움이 아니라, 인류의 영혼을 위한 싸움이었다.

sentences.english: The life of an <word id='_ordinary' class='word-eng-link'>ordinary</word> Natural was filled with hardship.
sentences.korean: <word id='_ordinary' class='word-target-kr'>보통의</word> 내추럴의 삶은 고난으로 가득 차 있었다.

sentences.english: The truth was <word id='_plain' class='word-eng-link'>plain</word> for all to see.
sentences.korean: 진실은 모두가 볼 수 있도록 <word id='_plain' class='word-target-kr'>분명했다</word>.

sentences.english: Their lives were <word id='_plain' class='word-eng-link'>plain</word> and without the luxuries of the Alphas.
sentences.korean: 그들의 삶은 알파들의 사치 없이 <word id='_plain' class='word-target-kr'>꾸밈없었다</word>.

sentences.english: The rebellion was becoming a <word id='_popular' class='word-eng-link'>popular' idea among the younger generation of Naturals.
sentences.korean: 반란은 젊은 세대의 내추럴들 사이에서 <word id='_popular' class='word-target-kr'>대중적인</word> 생각이 되어가고 있었다.

sentences.english: What <word id='_recompense' class='word-eng-link'>recompense</word> could ever be enough for the lives lost?
sentences.korean: 잃어버린 생명에 대해 어떤 <word id='_recompense' class='word-target-kr'>보상이</word> 충분할 수 있을까?

sentences.english: Kaelen had to <word id='_reconcile' class='word-eng-link'>reconcile</word> the need for violence with his own conscience.
sentences.korean: 카엘렌은 폭력의 필요성과 자신의 양심을 <word id='_reconcile' class='word-target-kr'>화해시켜야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: They had to constantly <word id='_reexamine' class='word-eng-link'>reexamine</word> their motives and their methods.
sentences.korean: 그들은 끊임없이 자신들의 동기와 방법을 <word id='_reexamine' class='word-target-kr'>재검토해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: A key <word id='_requirement' class='word-eng-link'>requirement</word> for joining the inner circle was absolute loyalty.
sentences.korean: 내부 서클에 합류하기 위한 핵심 <word id='_requirement' class='word-target-kr'>조건은</word> 절대적인 충성이었다.

sentences.english: Their actions would <word id='_revolutionize' class='word-eng-link'>revolutionize</word> their society.
sentences.korean: 그들의 행동은 사회에 <word id='_revolutionize' class='word-target-kr'>혁명을 일으킬</word> 것이었다.

sentences.english: Lyra was Kaelen's main <word id='_rival' class='word-eng-link'>rival</word> in this deadly game.
sentences.korean: 라이라는 이 치명적인 게임에서 카엘렌의 주요 <word id='_rival' class='word-target-kr'>경쟁자</word>였다.

sentences.english: They had to <word id='_shovel' class='word-eng-link'>shovel</word> through the rubble of a collapsed building to rescue trapped civilians.
sentences.korean: 그들은 갇힌 민간인을 구출하기 위해 무너진 건물의 잔해를 <word id='_shovel' class='word-target-kr'>삽으로 파야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: They had to <word id='_stretch' class='word-eng-link'>stretch</word> their meager resources as far as possible.
sentences.korean: 그들은 빈약한 자원을 가능한 한 멀리 <word id='_stretch' class='word-target-kr'>늘려야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: Kaelen's orders were always <word id='_succinct' class='word-eng-link'>succinct</word> and to the point.
sentences.korean: 카엘렌의 명령은 항상 <word id='_succinct' class='word-target-kr'>간결하고</word> 요점이 분명했다.

sentences.english: The plan was an <word id='_elaborated' class='word-eng-link'>elaborated</word> version of an old anarchist's theory.
sentences.korean: 그 계획은 오래된 무정부주의자의 이론의 <word id='_elaborated' class='word-target-kr'>복잡한</word> 버전이었다.

sentences.english: Kaelen had a unique <word id='_ability' class='word-eng-link'>ability</word> to inspire loyalty.
sentences.korean: 카엘렌은 충성심을 불러일으키는 독특한 <word id='_ability' class='word-target-kr'>능력을</word> 가지고 있었다.

sentences.english: His hidden network was not easily <word id='_accessible' class='word-eng-link'>accessible</word> to the Alphas.
sentences.korean: 그의 숨겨진 네트워크는 알파들에게 쉽게 <word id='_accessible' class='word-target-kr'>접근할 수</word> 없었다.

sentences.english: Not all the rebels would <word id='_accord' class='word-eng-link'>accord</word> with his cautious approach.
sentences.korean: 모든 반란군이 그의 신중한 접근 방식에 <word id='_accord' class='word-target-kr'>동의하는</word> 것은 아니었다.

sentences.english: Their escape route led them through a murky <word id='_bog' class='word-eng-link'>bog</word> in the undeveloped sectors.
sentences.korean: 그들의 탈출 경로는 미개발 구역의 탁한 <word id='_bog' class='word-target-kr'>습지를</word> 통과했다.

sentences.english: They had to <word id='_collaborate' class='word-eng-link'>collaborate</word> with a rival faction for a major operation.
sentences.korean: 그들은 주요 작전을 위해 경쟁 파벌과 <word id='_collaborate' class='word-target-kr'>협력해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: The Alphas' <word id='_contempt' class='word-eng-link'>contempt</word> for the Naturals was their greatest weakness.
sentences.korean: 내추럴에 대한 알파들의 <word id='_contempt' class='word-target-kr'>경멸은</word> 그들의 가장 큰 약점이었다.

sentences.english: Kaelen was never <word id='_content' class='word-eng-link'>content</word> with small victories.
sentences.korean: 카엘렌은 작은 승리에 결코 <word id='_content' class='word-target-kr'>만족하지</word> 않았다.

sentences.english: The city had become a <word id='_crucible' class='word-eng-link'>crucible</word>, forging a new kind of human being.
sentences.korean: 그 도시는 새로운 종류의 인간을 단련하는 <word id='_crucible' class='word-target-kr'>용광로가</word> 되었다.

sentences.english: He had to <word id='_curb' class='word-eng-link'>curb</word> his own anger to think clearly.
sentences.korean: 그는 명확하게 생각하기 위해 자신의 분노를 <word id='_curb' class='word-target-kr'>억제해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: The <word id='_cycle' class='word-eng-link'>cycle</word> of oppression had to be broken.
sentences.korean: 억압의 <word id='_cycle' class='word-target-kr'>주기는</word> 깨져야 했다.

sentences.english: The Alphas would <word id='_deem' class='word-eng-link'>deem</word> any gathering of Naturals a threat.
sentences.korean: 알파들은 어떤 내추럴들의 모임도 위협으로 <word id='_deem' class='word-target-kr'>여길</word> 것이었다.

sentences.english: A small group of rebels were incredibly <word id='_devout' class='word-eng-link'>devout</word> in their beliefs.
sentences.korean: 소규모의 반란군 집단은 자신들의 신념에 믿을 수 없을 정도로 <word id='_devout' class='word-target-kr'>독실했다</word>.

sentences.english: The propaganda was meant to <word id='_disperse' class='word-eng-link'>disperse</word> any hope of a successful rebellion.
sentences.korean: 선전은 성공적인 반란의 희망을 <word id='_disperse' class='word-target-kr'>흩어지게 하려는</word> 의도였다.

sentences.english: They had to be <word id='_economical' class='word-eng-link'>economical</word> with their limited ammunition.
sentences.korean: 그들은 제한된 탄약을 <word id='_economical' class='word-target-kr'>절약해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: <word id='_eventually' class='word-eng-link'>eventually</word>, he knew he would have to face Lyra directly.
sentences.korean: <word id='_eventually' class='word-target-kr'>결국</word>, 그는 라이라와 직접 맞서야 한다는 것을 알았다.

sentences.english: Their goal was to <word id='_expel' class='word-eng-link'>expel</word> the corrupt Alpha leadership from power.
sentences.korean: 그들의 목표는 부패한 알파 지도부를 권력에서 <word id='_expel' class='word-target-kr'>내쫓는</word> 것이었다.

sentences.english: He saw a <word id='_faint' class='word-eng-link'>faint</word> glimmer of hope in the eyes of a young rebel.
sentences.korean: 그는 젊은 반란군의 눈에서 <word id='_faint' class='word-target-kr'>희미한</word> 희망의 빛을 보았다.

sentences.english: The rebellion had no <word id='_financial' class='word-eng-link'>financial</word> backing, relying solely on scavenged resources.
sentences.korean: 반란은 <word id='_financial' class='word-target-kr'>재정적인</word> 지원 없이 오직 주워온 자원에만 의존했다.

sentences.english: The sight of the Alpha patrols was meant to <word id='_frighten' class='word-eng-link'>frighten</word> the populace into submission.
sentences.korean: 알파 순찰대의 모습은 대중을 굴복시키기 위해 <word id='_frighten' class='word-target-kr'>두렵게 하려는</word> 의도였다.

sentences.english: One of their allies was a professor of <word id='_geognosy' class='word-eng-link'>geognosy</word>, who knew the city's underground terrain better than anyone.
sentences.korean: 그들의 동맹 중 한 명은 도시의 지하 지형을 누구보다 잘 아는 <word id='_geognosy' class='word-target-kr'>지질학</word> 교수였다.

sentences.english: The old guard of the rebellion had to <word id='_give_way_to' class='word-eng-link'>give way to</word> new, more radical ideas.
sentences.korean: 반란의 구세대는 새롭고 더 급진적인 사상에 <word id='_give_way_to' class='word-target-kr'>양보해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: The <word id='_immense' class='word-eng-link'>immense</word> challenge ahead would test them all.
sentences.korean: 앞으로의 <word id='_immense' class='word-target-kr'>거대한</word> 도전은 그들 모두를 시험할 것이었다.

sentences.english: Their actions had to be <word id='_in_keeping_wit' class='word-eng-link'>in keeping wit</word>h their ultimate goal of a free society.
sentences.korean: 그들의 행동은 자유 사회라는 궁극적인 목표와 <word id='_in_keeping_wit' class='word-target-kr'>일치해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: An old <word id='_mariner' class='word-eng-link'>mariner</word> helped them navigate the city's forgotten waterways.
sentences.korean: 한 늙은 <word id='_mariner' class='word-target-kr'>선원이</word> 도시의 잊혀진 수로를 항해하는 것을 도왔다.

sentences.english: Their supply of medicine was <word id='_meager' class='word-eng-link'>meager</word>.
sentences.korean: 그들의 의약품 공급은 <word id='_meager' class='word-target-kr'>부족했다</word>.

sentences.english: The media's portrayal of Kaelen was a twisted <word id='_parody' class='word-eng-link'>parody</word> of the truth.
sentences.korean: 언론의 카엘렌 묘사는 진실의 왜곡된 <word id='_parody' class='word-target-kr'>풍자적 변형이었다</word>.

sentences.english: Extreme <word id='_precaution' class='word-eng-link'>precaution</word> was necessary for their survival.
sentences.korean: 그들의 생존을 위해서는 극도의 <word id='_precaution' class='word-target-kr'>조심이</word> 필요했다.

sentences.english: The Alpha leader was a true <word id='_rascal' class='word-eng-link'>rascal</word>, a villain hiding behind a mask of civility.
sentences.korean: 알파 지도자는 예의라는 가면 뒤에 숨은 진정한 <word id='_rascal' class='word-target-kr'>악당이었다</word>.

sentences.english: The rebellion offered a <word id='_refuge' class='word-eng-link'>refuge</word> for those who had nowhere else to go.
sentences.korean: 반란은 갈 곳 없는 사람들에게 <word id='_refuge' class='word-target-kr'>피난처를</word> 제공했다.

sentences.english: He had to <word id='_rescue' class='word-eng-link'>rescue</word> his captured allies before they were executed.
sentences.korean: 그는 처형되기 전에 포로로 잡힌 동맹들을 <word id='_rescue' class='word-target-kr'>구출해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: Their entire philosophy was <word id='_base_on' class='word-eng-link'>base on</word> the idea of freedom.
sentences.korean: 그들의 전체 철학은 자유라는 사상에 <word id='_base_on' class='word-target-kr'>근거를 두었다</word>.

sentences.english: They dreamed of a simple, <word id='_rural' class='word-eng-link'>rural</word> life, free from the city's corruption.
sentences.korean: 그들은 도시의 부패에서 벗어난 단순한 <word id='_rural' class='word-target-kr'>시골</word> 생활을 꿈꿨다.

sentences.english: They had to <word id='_scrub' class='word-eng-link'>scrub</word> their digital footprints after every operation.
sentences.korean: 그들은 모든 작전 후에 디지털 발자국을 <word id='_scrub' class='word-target-kr'>문질러</word> 지워야 했다.

sentences.english: He had to <word id='_secure' class='word-eng-link'>secure</word> a safe passage for a group of refugees.
sentences.korean: 그는 한 무리의 난민들을 위해 안전한 통로를 <word id='_secure' class='word-target-kr'>확보해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: There was a healthy dose of <word id='_skepticism' class='word-eng-link'>skepticism</word> among the rebels about their chances of success.
sentences.korean: 반란군 사이에는 성공 가능성에 대한 건전한 <word id='_skepticism' class='word-target-kr'>회의론이</word> 있었다.

sentences.english: <word id='_so_far' class='word-eng-link'>so far</word>, they had been lucky.
sentences.korean: <word id='_so_far' class='word-target-kr'>지금까지</word>, 그들은 운이 좋았다.

sentences.english: A single act of kindness could <word id='_spark' class='word-eng-link'>spark</word> a revolution.
sentences.korean: 한 번의 친절한 행동이 혁명을 <word id='_spark' class='word-target-kr'>야기할</word> 수 있었다.

sentences.english: There was much <word id='_speculation' class='word-eng-link'>speculation</word> about the AI's true motives.
sentences.korean: AI의 진정한 동기에 대한 많은 <word id='_speculation' class='word-target-kr'>심사숙고가</word> 있었다.

sentences.english: The city's <word id='_terrain' class='word-eng-link'>terrain</word> was as much an enemy as the Alphas themselves.
sentences.korean: 도시의 <word id='_terrain' class='word-target-kr'>지역은</word> 알파들 자신만큼이나 적이었다.

sentences.english: The final assault would create a great <word id='_tumult' class='word-eng-link'>tumult</word>, a chaos from which a new order could be born.
sentences.korean: 마지막 공격은 큰 <word id='_tumult' class='word-target-kr'>소란</word>, 즉 새로운 질서가 탄생할 수 있는 혼돈을 만들 것이었다.
